name: Trust the blackbird
description:
Trust the blackbird is a hand-drawn 2d game made in a form of comics with lovely watercolour illustrations. Follow the heart-warming story about meeting new friend and following the dreams. As the story unfolds, couple of light puzzles will be on your way.

Created for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

Controllers:
up/down to move the camera view; mouse click to open the next pad

Credits:

  • Game design, Art, Amination & Code: Anastasia Merzlaya
  • Music: Bartosz Maksiak

P.S.  Actually, it is my first finished game

P.P.S. You can check more of my art here: https://www.instagram.com/ana.merzlaya/
